name: Guns'n'Stories: Bulletproof VR
description: Guns’n’Stories: Bulletproof is a dynamic VR western shooter that fully immerses players into the ambiance of weird Wild West. Stepping the tangled storyline, you will encounter many intimidating but comical enemies and fight Big Bosses.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports
